dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, a young apprentice named Eryndor Thorne sets out on a journey to discover the truth behind its vanishing.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of an ancient spellbook hidden deep within the nearby forest, which might hold the key to restoring magic. I must find it!

dialogues.speaker: Lyra Flynn
dialogues.text: Eryndor, wait! I'm coming with you. My knowledge of the forest and its creatures will be invaluable on this quest.
